custom-sql.sql: INSERT INTO SocialEquityAssetEntry (equityAssetEntryId, groupId, companyId, userId, assetEntryId, informationK, informationB) VALUES ([$EQUITY_ASSET_ENTRY_ID$], [$GROUP_ID$], [$COMPANY_ID$], [$USER_ID$], [$ASSET_ENTRY_ID$], 0, 0)

INSERT INTO SocialEquityUser (equityUserId, groupId, companyId, userId, contributionK, contributionB, participationK, participationB, rank) VALUES ([$EQUITY_USER_ID$], [$GROUP_ID$], [$COMPANY_ID$], [$USER_ID$], 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
UPDATE SocialEquityAssetEntry SET informationK = COALESCE(informationK, 0) + [$INFORMATION_K$], informationB = COALESCE(informationB, 0) + [$INFORMATION_B$] WHERE assetEntryId = [$ASSET_ENTRY_ID$]

UPDATE SocialEquityUser SET contributionK = COALESCE(contributionK, 0) + [$CONTRIBUTION_K$], contributionB = COALESCE(contributionB, 0) + [$CONTRIBUTION_B$] WHERE (groupId = [$GROUP_ID$]) AND (userId = [$USER_ID$])

UPDATE SocialEquityUser SET participationK = COALESCE(participationK, 0) + [$PARTICIPATION_K$], participationB = COALESCE(participationB, 0) + [$PARTICIPATION_B$] WHERE (groupId = [$GROUP_ID$]) AND (userId = [$USER_ID$])

UPDATE SocialEquityAssetEntry SET informationK = informationK - ( SELECT SUM(-value / (expiration - actionDate)) FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (SocialEquityLog.assetEntryId = SocialEquityAssetEntry.assetEntryId) AND (type_ = [$TYPE_INFORMATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) ), informationB = informationB - ( SELECT SUM(-(-value / (expiration - actionDate)) * expiration) FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (SocialEquityLog.assetEntryId = SocialEquityAssetEntry.assetEntryId) AND (type_ = [$TYPE_INFORMATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) ) WHERE assetEntryId IN ( SELECT assetEntryId FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (type_ = [$TYPE_INFORMATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) )
UPDATE SocialEquityLog SET active_ = [$FALSE$] WHERE (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$])
DELETE FROM SocialEquityUser WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM User_ WHERE User_.userId = SocialEquityUser.userId )

UPDATE SocialEquityUser SET contributionK = ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(informationK), 0) FROM SocialEquityAssetEntry WHERE (SocialEquityAssetEntry.groupId = SocialEquityUser.groupId) AND (SocialEquityAssetEntry.userId = SocialEquityUser.userId) ), contributionB = ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(informationB), 0) FROM SocialEquityAssetEntry WHERE (SocialEquityAssetEntry.groupId = SocialEquityUser.groupId) AND (SocialEquityAssetEntry.userId = SocialEquityUser.userId) ) WHERE userId IN ( SELECT userId FROM SocialEquityAssetEntry WHERE assetEntryId IN ( SELECT assetEntryId FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) AND (type_ = [$TYPE_INFORMATION$]) ) )

UPDATE SocialEquityUser SET participationK = participationK - ( SELECT SUM(-value / (expiration - actionDate)) FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (SocialEquityLog.groupId = SocialEquityUser.groupId) AND (SocialEquityLog.userId = SocialEquityUser.userId) AND (type_ = [$TYPE_PARTICIPATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) ), participationB = participationB - ( SELECT SUM(-(-value / (expiration - actionDate)) * expiration) FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (SocialEquityLog.groupId = SocialEquityUser.groupId) AND (SocialEquityLog.userId = SocialEquityUser.userId) AND (type_ = [$TYPE_PARTICIPATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) ) WHERE userId IN ( SELECT userId FROM SocialEquityLog WHERE (type_ = [$TYPE_PARTICIPATION$]) AND (expiration <= [$EXPIRATION$]) AND (active_ = [$TRUE$]) )

SELECT equityUserId, SocialEquityUser.groupId, ([$ACTION_DATE$] * (COALESCE(contributionK, 0) + COALESCE(participationK, 0)) + COALESCE(contributionB, 0) + COALESCE(participationB, 0)) AS equityValue, status FROM SocialEquityUser INNER JOIN User_ ON SocialEquityUser.userId = User_.userId ORDER BY groupId, equityValue DESC

SELECT equityUserId, SocialEquityUser.groupId, ([$ACTION_DATE$] * (COALESCE(contributionK, 0) + COALESCE(participationK, 0)) + COALESCE(contributionB, 0) + COALESCE(participationB, 0)) AS equityValue, status FROM SocialEquityUser INNER JOIN User_ ON SocialEquityUser.userId = User_.userId WHERE (groupId = [$GROUP_ID$]) ORDER BY equityValue DESC
UPDATE SocialEquityUser SET rank = ? WHERE (equityUserId = ?) AND (rank != ?)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT classPK) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivityCounter WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND (name IN ([$NAME$])) AND (startPeriod + ? >= ?) AND (endPeriod = -1)

SELECT name, SUM(currentValue) currentValue, startPeriod, endPeriod FROM SocialActivityCounter WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (name = ?) AND (startPeriod >= ?) AND ( (endPeriod <= ?) OR (endPeriod = -1) ) GROUP BY name, startPeriod, endPeriod ORDER BY startPeriod

SELECT classNameId, name, SUM(currentValue) currentValue FROM SocialActivityCounter WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (name = ?) AND (startPeriod >= ?) AND ( (endPeriod <= ?) OR (endPeriod = -1) ) GROUP BY classNameId, name ORDER BY currentValue DESC
SELECT {SocialActivityCounter.*} FROM SocialActivityCounter WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND (classPK IN ([$CLASS_PK$])) AND (name IN ([$NAME$])) AND (endPeriod = -1) ORDER BY classPK

SELECT classPK FROM SocialActivityCounter WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND (name IN ([$NAME$])) AND (startPeriod >= ?) AND (endPeriod = -1) GROUP BY classPK ORDER BY SUM(currentValue) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Users_Groups ON (Users_Groups.userId = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Users_Groups.groupId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Organization_.organizationId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Users_Orgs ON (Users_Orgs.userId = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Users_Orgs.organizationId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SocialActivity.activityId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SocialActivity.activityId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity WHERE ( groupId IN ( SELECT groupId FROM Users_Groups WHERE userId = ? ) ) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0)

( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity WHERE ( groupId IN ( SELECT groupId FROM Users_Groups WHERE userId = ? ) ) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0) ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND ( Organization_.organizationId IN ( SELECT organizationId FROM Users_Orgs WHERE Users_Orgs.userId = ? ) ) )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND ( Organization_.organizationId IN ( SELECT organizationId FROM Users_Orgs WHERE Users_Orgs.userId = ? ) )
SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0) ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Users_Groups ON (Users_Groups.userId = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Users_Groups.groupId = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC

SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Organization_.organizationId = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC

SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Users_Orgs ON (Users_Orgs.userId = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (Users_Orgs.organizationId = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.userId) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC
SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity WHERE ( groupId IN ( SELECT groupId FROM Users_Groups WHERE userId = ? ) ) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0) ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT TEMP_TABLE.* FROM ( SELECT SocialActivity.activityId AS activityId, SocialActivity.createDate AS createDate FROM SocialActivity WHERE ( groupId IN ( SELECT groupId FROM Users_Groups WHERE userId = ? ) ) AND (mirrorActivityId = 0)
UNION ALL
SELECT SocialActivity.activityId AS activityId, SocialActivity.createDate AS createDate FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND ( Organization_.organizationId IN ( SELECT organizationId FROM Users_Orgs WHERE Users_Orgs.userId = ? ) ) ) TEMP_TABLE ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = SocialActivity.groupId) INNER JOIN Organization_ ON (Organization_.organizationId = Group_.classPK) WHERE (SocialActivity.mirrorActivityId = 0) AND ( Organization_.organizationId IN ( SELECT organizationId FROM Users_Orgs WHERE Users_Orgs.userId = ? ) ) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC
